briefTitle: Zoledronic Acid Versus Alendronate for Prevention of Bone Loss After Organ Transplantation

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* A man or woman, aged 20 to 70, of any race who has had a heart or liver transplant

Exclusion Criteria:

* hyperparathyroidism
* Paget's disease
* hyperthyroidism
* cancer
* severe kidney disease,
* intestinal disease
* active peptic ulcer disease
* current or past treatment for osteoporosis
* pregnancy or lactation
* severe oral/dental disease

outcomeMeasures.title: Percentage Change From Baseline in Total Hip Bone Mineral Density (BMD) at 12 Months
outcomeMeasures.description: BMD was measured by dual-energy x-ray absorptiometry (QDR-4500 densitometer; Hologic, Inc., Bedford, MA); short-term in vivo coefficient of variation is 0.68% (spine) and 1.36% (femoral neck). T scores were generated using gender-specific databases provided by the manufacturer.
